docs.lead_paragraph: After a talk at the White House on Wednesday with the leaders of the United States delegation to the special meeting of the Inter-American Economic and Social Council, which opens in Punta del Este, Uruguay, today, President Kennedy said: "The hopes of millions of people throughout the Americas rest to a very large extent on the success of your efforts.
